Get started for free
Your creativity, unblocked with Figma AI

Get started faster, find what you’re looking for, and stay in the flow. Make space for more creativity.

Learn about our approach to building AI

YOU'RE IN GOOD COMPANY

Go from first draft to final product, faster

Figma’s AI features remove the blockers in your workflow so that you can focus on the design details that matter.

Get a jumpstart with AI

Quickly search for the design assets you need to get started. Generate new design mockups in seconds as a first draft.

Let AI sweat the details

Intelligently rewrite text, auto-name your layers, and easily find the assets you need.

Prototype in a click

Instantly turn your static mocks into an interactive prototype with the touch of a button. Spend less time tediously connecting noodles, and more time designing.

Six AI features to keep you in the flow
Search with a visual

Upload an image to instantly find an exact match or a similar design your teammates have created.

Rename layers automatically

With just a click, you can contextually rename and organize all your layers. And yes, your teammates will love you for it.

Add relevant content

Generate and replace text content directly in your design mocks. Less lorem ipsum, more true-to-life designs.

Instantly remove backgrounds

Remove image backgrounds in just a click to isolate your subject. Say goodbye to manually lassoing and erasing.

Rewrite and translate with AI

Adjust the length and tone of your copy or translate it—directly in your design. Repeat til you find what fits.

Generate, sort, summarize

FigJam AI helps you instantly visualize complex ideas into simple diagrams, sort feedback, and automate tedious tasks.

The power to generate first drafts fast got my creativity going, sped up my workflow, and freed my mind to dream up unique ideas.

Kat Temple
Senior Product Designer, ServiceNow

Looking for more on AI? We’ve got you.
AI + design: Figma users tell us what’s coming next

What do designers, developers, and executives really think about the promise of AI? Our new survey aims to find out.

Read more

Introducing Figma AI: Empowering designers with intelligent tools

From generating UI layouts to transforming your static designs into interactive prototypes, our new AI-powered features help you focus on bringing your best ideas to life.

Read more

How AI will influence creative tools: A conversation with David Hoang

David Hoang talks about how AI is reshaping the future of product design and development, and the role it’s playing in the company’s team and products.

Read more

Six AI features to keep you in the flow

With just a click, you can contextually rename and organize all your layers. And yes, your teammates will love you for it.

Add relevant content

Generate and replace text content directly in your design mocks. Less lorem ipsum, more true-to-life designs.

Instantly remove backgrounds

Remove image backgrounds in just a click to isolate your subject. Say goodbye to manually lassoing and erasing.

Rewrite and translate with AI

Adjust the length and tone of your copy or translate it—directly in your design. Repeat til you find what fits.

Stories about how products take shape—and shape our world
Design and prototype in one place
Get started faster, find what you’re looking for, and stay in the flow. Make space for more creativity.
Figma’s AI features remove the blockers in your workflow so that you can focus on the design details that matter.
Quickly search for the design assets you need to get started. Generate new design mockups in seconds as a first draft.
Intelligently rewrite text, auto-name your layers, and easily find the assets you need.
Instantly turn your static mocks into an interactive prototype with the touch of a button. Spend less time tediously connecting noodles, and more time designing.
Upload an image to instantly find an exact match or a similar design your teammates have created.
With just a click, you can contextually rename and organize all your layers. And yes, your teammates will love you for it.
Generate and replace text content directly in your design mocks. Less lorem ipsum, more true-to-life designs.
Remove image backgrounds in just a click to isolate your subject. Say goodbye to manually lassoing and erasing.
Adjust the length and tone of your copy or translate it—directly in your design. Repeat til you find what fits.
FigJam AI helps you instantly visualize complex ideas into simple diagrams, sort feedback, and automate tedious tasks.

Kat Temple
Senior Product Designer, ServiceNow
What do designers, developers, and executives really think about the promise of AI? Our new survey aims to find out.
From generating UI layouts to transforming your static designs into interactive prototypes, our new AI-powered features help you focus on bringing your best ideas to life.
David Hoang talks about how AI is reshaping the future of product design and development, and the role it’s playing in the company’s team and products.
